Sentencas: New perovskite oxides La0.75Sr0.25Mn0.5Cr0.5-xCuxO3-delta(LSMCr0.5-xCux, x=0, 0.05, 0.10, 0.20) were developed as anode materials for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC).
Titulo: Synthesis and Characterization of La0.75Sr0.25Mn0.5Cr0.5-xCuxO3-δ for SOFC Anode Material

Sentencas: Phase analysis, chemical compatibility with YSZ electrolyte and microstructure of LSMCr0.5-xCux were characterized by X-Ray diffusion (XRD) and transmission electron microscope (TEM), respectively.
Titulo: Synthesis and Characterization of La0.75Sr0.25Mn0.5Cr0.5-xCuxO3-δ for SOFC Anode Material

Sentencas: The total conductivities of LSMCr0.5-xCux in different atmospheres were measured by four-terminal DC method, and the AC electrochemical impedance spectra measurements were carried out using symmetrical cell method.
Titulo: Synthesis and Characterization of La0.75Sr0.25Mn0.5Cr0.5-xCuxO3-δ for SOFC Anode Material

Sentencas: The as-prepared LSMCr0.5-xCux powders are pure rhombohedral perovskite phase confirmed by XRD, and the size of particles increase with increasing Cu content.
Titulo: Synthesis and Characterization of La0.75Sr0.25Mn0.5Cr0.5-xCuxO3-δ for SOFC Anode Material

Sentencas: No third impurity phase is observed when LSMCr0.5-xCux (x=0, 0.05, 0.10) and YSZ are heat-treated in air at 1200 degrees C for 3 h, indicating good chemical compatibility between the anode materials and YSZ electrolyte: The total conductivity of doped materials increases remarkably with increasing Cu content in air and in 5% H-2-Ar atmosphere.
Titulo: Synthesis and Characterization of La0.75Sr0.25Mn0.5Cr0.5-xCuxO3-δ for SOFC Anode Material

Sentencas: In addition, the impedance spectra show that the ASR (anode surface resistance) value of LSMCr0.5-xCux in wet 5% H-2-Ar atmosphere is lower than that of undoped LSCM and reaches the minimum value (0.38 Omega.cm(2)) at 900 degrees C when x is 0.05.
Titulo: Synthesis and Characterization of La0.75Sr0.25Mn0.5Cr0.5-xCuxO3-δ for SOFC Anode Material
